ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psgnfix.p | |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) |
| 2 |  | psgnfix.t | |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` ( N \ { K } ) ) |
| 3 |  | psgnfix.s | |- S = ( SymGrp ` ( N \ { K } ) ) |
| 4 |  | psgnfix.z | |- Z = ( SymGrp ` N ) |
| 5 |  | psgnfix.r | |- R = ran ( pmTrsp ` N ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elrabi | |- ( Q e. { q e. P | ( q ` K ) = K } -> Q e. P ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ K e. N ) /\ Q e. { q e. P | ( q ` K ) = K } ) -> Q e. P ) |
| 8 | 4 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( Base ` Z ) = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_eqtr4i | |- P = ( Base ` Z ) |
| 10 | 4, 9, 5 | #P_psgnfitr | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( Q e. P <-> E. w e. Word R Q = ( Z gsum w ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_bicomd | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( E. w e. Word R Q = ( Z gsum w ) <-> Q e. P ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_ad2antrr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ K e. N ) /\ Q e. { q e. P | ( q ` K ) = K } ) -> ( E. w e. Word R Q = ( Z gsum w ) <-> Q e. P ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 12 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ K e. N ) /\ Q e. { q e. P | ( q ` K ) = K } ) -> E. w e. Word R Q = ( Z gsum w ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_ex | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ K e. N ) -> ( Q e. { q e. P | ( q ` K ) = K } -> E. w e. Word R Q = ( Z gsum w ) ) ) |
